entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
